document.full_text: laurent gbagbo has called on ivory coast's civilians to help his forces "neutralize" suspected rebels, raising fears of a return to all out civil war as fighting continued in abidjan on friday.
document.title: gbagbo calls on civilians to join ivory coast struggle
lines_and_colors: laurent gbagbo has called on ivory coast's civilians to help his forces "neutralize" suspected rebels, raising fears of a return to all out civil war as fighting continued in abidjan on friday.
